mapper.insert: insert into movie_title (movie_title, movie_filename, uuid, reg_date, movie_resist_filePath, sizes, movie_textarea, uploadPaths, filePath) values (#{movie_title}, #{movie_filename}, #{uuid}, now(), #{movie_resist_filePath}, #{size}, #{movie_textarea},#{uploadPaths}, #{filePath});

insert into event_board_image (filePath, event_name,uploadPaths, size, movie_filename,resist_textarea,movie_resist_filepath) values(#{filePath}, #{event_name},#{uploadPaths},#{size},#{movie_filename}, #{resist_textarea}, #{movie_resist_filePath})
